title: The minimum width of the ramps in hospitals shall be 2
clause_text: The minimum width of the ramps in hospitals shall be 2.25 m. Handrails shall be provided on both sides of the ramp. Ramps shall lead directly to outside open space at ground level or courtyards or safe place.
